RHighlight.p: Almost every aspect of Ban Suriya is a highlight. The bathrooms are certainly worth a special mention thanks to the semi-outdoor designs and indoor landscaping, as are the multifarious, attractively furnished lounge areas (four in all, if you count the one in master suite). The gym annex is a ‘villa within a villa’ and a great option for older kids or singles. Outside, the poolside sala is an appealing place for drinks and dinner and the tree house is a stroke of genius that will delight kids and adults alike.

RSurroundArea.p:
There's really very little to pull you away from the facilities and comforts at Ban Suriya. A stroll along the sand provides a sense of the island's past and the local fishermen and coconut farmers generally go about their business as if you weren't there.
For a slight variation, a day spent poolside at Nikki Beach, just ten minutes’ walk away, sipping mojitos and snacking on haute cuisine while listening to the latest dance tunes spun by the resident DJ, makes a nice change (although you can do all that onsite at Ban Suriya). Sunsets from Lipa Noi are some of the best on the island so you can time your indulgences to match the backdrop.
Further afield, the evening food market by the main ferry pier in Nathon offers a buzzing local scene and a sharp but interesting contrast to the island's more sophisticated side. Lamai (15km) is Samui's second largest tourist beach and offers all the benefits of an international tourist town with a choice of supermarkets, shops, restaurants and nightlife. But it's only worth a visit if you crave busier, more commercial surroundings.

ROverallComments.p:
Ban Suriya is one of those villas where, as reviewers, you find yourself looking for something negative just to tick the ‘Surprises’ box. We failed.
Our time passed far too quickly at Ban Suriya. In fact, a month would probably be needed to enjoy the villa to the full. It's not only the salubrious surroundings that stand out, it's the way everything seems to go that extra mile to please. There's not just a computer, there's an iMac packed with tunes that you can play through Bose speakers in the lounge and poolside sala (gazebo). The gym is not only well-equipped, it has a fridge, and a plunge pool bigger than some other villas' main pool. Even the DVD collection includes films you wish you'd remembered to buy at the airport.
Ironically, even with so many options we found ourselves drawn to the simplest – the tree house by the beach. The staff is clearly proud to be part of the Ban Suriya experience and the live-in manager was knowledgeable and keen to help us appreciate the villa's pleasures. Although each bedroom is noticeably different, with no one losing out, the master is clearly the most extravagant with its terrazzo bath tub and ensuite lounge. Clever design touches in the guest rooms like direct pool and jacuzzi access, indulgent semi-outdoor bathrooms and hand-picked, stylish furnishings ensure everyone is content, while those staying the twin bedroom by the games room and gym or cosseted in the beachfront pavilion also enjoy complete privacy and independence.
Eight people is probably the minimum number you would need to fully appreciate this villa (there's an option to rent four bedrooms outside peak season), otherwise you might struggle to appreciate its exuberance.

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: We found only pleasant surprises, really. Occasional traffic noise from the road behind the villa may worry sensitive souls, but it's only noticeable because the location is so serene. Although Ban Suriya is definitely family-friendly, the ‘floating’ stairs leading to the mezzanine lounge, the sliding doors opening directly to the pool, and the ungated beach access mean it would be wise to keep small children closely supervised.

REVIEW.Name: Acquired bookings Acquired bookings
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We love your place. A wonderful home and facilities. Yours staff are very professional and very nice. Please thanks them for us. And we hope to come back soon. Thank you for your kindness. Please don't forget my recipe of the spaghetti!!

REVIEW.Name: Nomad The Luxe agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Can't believe how time just flies in Ban Suriya. The Villa is amazing but what makes it more special is the crew! They are warm and inviting and they treat us like family. They absolutely adore our twins and in return, all of us had a fantastic time. Their attentiveness to all of our requests is incredible. Two thumbs up for the delicious food! We will definitely miss this villa and the most kind and gracious crew, We don't want to go back home. All the best Ban Suriya, keep being special!

REVIEW.Name: Acquired bookings Acquired bookings
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks to Tik and the amazing team. The most magnificent location on the planet crowned the most magnificent wedding! Five days of bliss made splendidly effortless by a great team. Thanks for your warm hospitality, excellent cooking - Pueng was Fantastic! Can't wait to come back.

REVIEW.Name: EIHAB TRAVELS LLC
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you sooo much for making this holiday a fantastic one. Tik, Kai, Mohammed and everyone else that has worked so hard this week to make our stay unforgettable. We loved everything here - from the food, service, property to the friendly security guard that made us feel very safe while sleeping through the night. This place is definitely one of our favorites and you will see us again. Thank you for all the mangoes!

REVIEW.Name: Acquired bookings Acquired bookings
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was so wonderful to come back to this beautiful place again. You Tik and your fabulous team made our holiday for us and our friends really special and unforgettable - especially your marvelous Thai cuisine (yummy yummy). Your warm hospitality and your lovely decorations made our holiday extraordinary, thank you so much!

REVIEW.Name: Kirsty Mactaggart
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Dear Tik, Kai, Max, Nom and Oy, thank you so much for taking such good care of us. We've had the most wonderful couple of days and hope to come back again, Thank you for all the recipes and the chicken satay packs! Our tummies will be eternally grateful. Such an amazing few days, we will miss Ban Suriya and it's people.

REVIEW.Name: DREAMCATCHERS EVENTS PARTNER LIMITED
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much to you and your team for your wonderful hospitality! You have been very accommodating and helpful to us and our family and we can't be happier with your service. Ban Suriya is a beautiful location and we wouldn't hesitate recommending this villa to our friends. Take care, hope you manage to find a nice home for the kitties and hope to see you again!

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I loved the house - it is very nice. Liked our activities - it was fun. I enjoyed it here a lot. I wish I can come back soon, this has been a lovely holiday! Thanks a lot for this memorable holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Acquired bookings Acquired bookings
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wow! What can I say, we had the most amazing stay in Ban Suriya. An incredible villa with even more incredible staff. Thank you for being such amazing and attentive hosts. We had the best time celebrating Mr and Mrs Lemmon's wedding! Also the chef cooked us delicious food every evening. We especially enjoyed the Massaman Curry! Thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: None of summers is as good as this one. Thank you Tik and your crew. One more thing - noodles provided in breakfast is AWESOME! Best noodles ever!

REVIEW.Name: Mikaela Eileen Lancaster
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Such an amazing stay. We had the time of our lives, pool was awesome, food was amazing, thank you Ban Suriya,

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Villas & Homes /Island property Services
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful summer holiday. Thank you Tik and your team.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for this lovely stay. Tik, Kai, Chef Pueng and all the team - you made us feel better than at home. Every detail was magic - the food was fantastic, the flowers on the bed every night were fabulous, the kids all asked if we could stay here all the time. Hope to see you all next year.

REVIEW.Name: Jenn Hui-Tan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had an absolutely wonderful time, thank you so much for your amazing hospitality and service, we will never forget it! Thank you also for making my 40th birthday celebration so wonderful.

REVIEW.Name: Acquired bookings Acquired bookings
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for all your contribution to our wonderful family holiday. Julie had a fantastic 60th birthday and the special meal you presented to her was outstanding. We could not have selected a better venue and service.

REVIEW.Name: Network Technology Co., LIMITED Shenzhen YesVilla
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all for your contribution. You are so nice and kind to everyone here. You guys made our holiday more comfortable and special. The environment of the villa is wonderful and fully equipped. Even the weather is cloudy or raining, we all love here and very enjoyed to stay here with you guys. Thanks for Tik help us to plan our schedule and meals. Thanks for the team to keep the villa neat and tidy. Thanks for the food from the chef. We all love your food! Thanks for the security to protect us at night. We will miss you guys and hope everything goes well.

REVIEW.Name: Mutiara Mahatan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for everything, we love you. Thank you very much for the amazing things you have done for us.

REVIEW.Name: Frederik Wisselink
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for our wonderful stay. The villa is amazing, the view is stunning but mostly you made our stay an amazing one. Big compliment to the chef, we loved the Thai food. Definitely a vacation to remember.

REVIEW.Name: LTD Caroline Sommer
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was a great pleasure to meet you here in such a beautiful, special and amazing place (first Thailand experience). We loved the food, we loved the view and we loved the great service you gave us with your kindly way. For the future we wish you all the best and nice guests, because you deserve it.

REVIEW.Name: Adrian Lim
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Ban Suriya is indeed great! We all had fun as guests and we were never bored. The staff on board were all very accommodating. Truely impressed!
